description:
Tomozaki enlists the help of friends to help Tama improve and boost the mood at school, but Aoi Hinami is vehemently opposed to Tama changing at all.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Battles Are Better When You`re Against Someone Whose Signature Move Is the Opposite of Yours
Tokuiwaza ga Magyaku no Character ga Itakata ga Sentou wa Antei Suru
得意技が真逆のキャラクターがいた方が戦闘は安定する
